full_text: Page 1256 Fwd: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 From [redacted] To [redacted] Sonya Thompson Date 2019/08/13 12:47 Subject Fwd: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments TEXT.htm, Epstein [redacted] 6318-054_SRO_20190710-20190 723.pdf, Epstein [redacted] 76318-054_SRO_20190729-20190 810.pdf [redacted] See attached reconstructed SROs. >> [redacted] 8/13/2019 11:36 AM >>> [redacted] I attached 2 copies of Epstein SRO reviews: 1. Epstein [redacted] 76318-054_SRO_20190710-20190723.pdf (confined in SHU 7/10/2019 - 7/23/2019), and 2. Epstein [redacted] 76318-054_SRO_20190729-20190810.pdf (confined in SHU 7/29/2019 - 8/10/2019) Because the first confinement, Epstein was held only 2 days in SHU (7/7/2019 - 7/8/2019), NYM did not review Epstein. Thanks, [redacted] >> [redacted] @bop.gov> 8/12/2019 12:40 PM >>> Please do it. We need it tomorrow morning at the latest. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message --------- From: [redacted] @bop.gov> Date: 8/12/19 12:38 PM (GMT-05:00) To: [redacted] @bop.gov> Cc: [redacted] @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 >>> [redacted] 08/12/2019 12:38 >>> [redacted] SRO review data is stored in DREV table. But SHU generates SRO review for inmates are currently in Z house. I need to write some code to get around to get the SRO reports for Epstein. [redacted] Page 3654 DOJ-OGR-00025450

text_blocks.content: Fwd: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054

From [redacted] To [redacted] Sonya Thompson Date 2019/08/13 12:47 Subject Fwd: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments TEXT.htm, Epstein [redacted] 6318-054_SRO_20190710-20190 723.pdf, Epstein [redacted] 76318-054_SRO_20190729-20190 810.pdf

I attached 2 copies of Epstein SRO reviews: 1. Epstein [redacted] 76318-054_SRO_20190710-20190723.pdf (confined in SHU 7/10/2019 - 7/23/2019), and 2. Epstein [redacted] 76318-054_SRO_20190729-20190810.pdf (confined in SHU 7/29/2019 - 8/10/2019)
Because the first confinement, Epstein was held only 2 days in SHU (7/7/2019 - 7/8/2019), NYM did not review Epstein.
Please do it. We need it tomorrow morning at the latest.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

-------- Original message --------- From: [redacted] @bop.gov> Date: 8/12/19 12:38 PM (GMT-05:00) To: [redacted] @bop.gov> Cc: [redacted] @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054
SRO review data is stored in DREV table. But SHU generates SRO review for inmates are currently in Z house. I need to write some code to get around to get the SRO reports for Epstein.

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the reconstruction of data for Inmate Epstein. Multiple names and email addresses have been redacted.
